  â†“

## Decision Tree

```
START
  â”‚
  â–¼
Does 'main' branch exist?
  â”‚
  â”œâ”€ No â”€â”€â†’ FAIL: "Base branch missing" â”€â”€â†’ END
  â”‚
  â–¼
Does 'preview' branch exist?
  â”‚
  â”œâ”€ Yes â”€â”€â†’ [Go to Compare]
  â”‚
  â”œâ”€ No
  â”‚   â”‚
  â”‚   â–¼
  â”‚   create_preview_if_missing = true?
  â”‚   â”‚
  â”‚   â”œâ”€ Yes â”€â”€â†’ Create preview from main
  â”‚   â”‚          â”‚
  â”‚   â”‚          â–¼
  â”‚   â”‚          SUCCESS: Show summary, Exit
  â”‚   â”‚          
  â”‚   â””â”€ No â”€â”€â†’ FAIL: "Preview missing" â”€â”€â†’ END
  â”‚
  â–¼
Compare branches
  â”‚
  â–¼
Changes found (ahead_by > 0)?
  â”‚
  â”œâ”€ No â”€â”€â†’ SUCCESS: Show "No changes", Exit
  â”‚
  â–¼
Does PR already exist (previewâ†’main)?
  â”‚
  â”œâ”€ Yes â”€â”€â†’ Update existing PR
  â”‚
  â”œâ”€ No â”€â”€â†’ Create new PR
  â”‚
  â–¼
auto_merge = true?
  â”‚
  â”œâ”€ No â”€â”€â†’ SUCCESS: Show "PR created", Exit
  â”‚
  â–¼
Attempt auto-merge
  â”‚
  â”œâ”€ Success â”€â”€â†’ SUCCESS: Show "Auto-merged", Exit
  â”‚
  â””â”€ Blocked â”€â”€â†’ SUCCESS: Show "Merge blocked", Exit
```

## Error Flow

```
Any step
  â†“
Error occurs
  â†“
Catch error
  â†“
core.setFailed(error.message)
  â†“
Show error summary:
â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”
â”‚ âŒ Workflow Failed                  â”‚
â”‚                                     â”‚
â”‚ Error: <error message>              â”‚
â”‚                                     â”‚
â”‚ Please check the workflow logs      â”‚
â”‚ for details.                        â”‚
â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜
  â†“

```

## Key Features Highlighted

### ğŸ›¡ï¸ Safety Features
- âœ… Validates before acting
- âœ… Graceful error handling
- âœ… Clear user feedback
- âœ… No destructive operations
- âœ… Respects branch protection

### ğŸš€ Automation Features
- âœ… Auto-creates missing branches
- âœ… Auto-updates existing PRs
- âœ… Optional auto-merge
- âœ… Structured outputs for integration
- âœ… Smart skip logic

### ğŸ“Š User Experience Features
- âœ… Workflow summaries
- âœ… Clear status messages
- âœ… Helpful error messages
- âœ… Direct PR links
- âœ… Next steps guidance

### ğŸ”§ Flexibility Features
- âœ… Configurable branch creation
- âœ… Configurable auto-merge
- âœ… Works with/without branch protection
- âœ… Handles all edge cases
- âœ… Integration-ready outputs

---

**Legend:**
- âœ“ = Success/Check passed
- âœ— = Failed/Missing
- â†’ = User action required
- â–¼ = Flow continues
- â”œâ”€ = Decision branch
